system.availability: Servo-Skull designed for a singular utility function. Examples include: Auger, Courier, Illuminator, Loud Hailer, Medicae, Utility, etc.
system.cost: See Bestiary/InqHandbook Pg 145. Augur: (Rare/1500), Courier (Rare/1800), Illuminator (Scarce/950), Loud Hailer(Scarce/1000), Medicae(Rare/2500), Utility(Scarce/1500)
